Most people are too aggressive and defensive during confrontations. 
 
 They lose their humanity and their humility. 
 
 It's possible to confront someone (or be confronted) in a gentle, effective way that leads not only to your desired result, but also in a way that brings two people closer together personally or professionally.
making your point without making a enemy is what is commonly referred to as tact
